directions: Use the commands n, s, e, w to move through the game.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: There is a couch by the door and a TV on the wall

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: There is a toilet across from the door and a bath east of the toilet.

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description: There is a bed east of the door and a chest of drawers directly across from the bed.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: There is a refrigerator west of the door and a stove east of the door.
